description:
It`s been a year and Luciel needs to renew his registration at the Healer`s Guild. What rank will he be?  Luciel jumps into the next level of his training, when he encounters the Healer who left Monika to die...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Botakûri, directeur du centre de guérison
The Healing Clinic and the Arrival of Bottaculli
治癒院長ボタクーリ登場
